name: HAACHAMA HELL
description:
This is my second game - a bullethell like shoot'em up game. 

This is also a 2 players game, where players need to fight off waves of enemies, and finally defeat the boss to win the game. In addition, players are able to create shields around them that protects them from enemy bullets, as well as collect powerups to fend off enemies with more ease.

Click "Run Game" to play!

Please click the icon at the bottom-right to play in fullscreen if you encounter a page scrolling problem while playing the game.
